% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	{\mathrm{Aff}_{k}(\mathrm{Aff}_{k}(A))} && {\mathrm{Aff}_{k}(A)} \\
	\\
	{\mathrm{Aff}_{k}(A)} && A
	\arrow["{\mathrm{ev}_{A}}", from=1-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\mathrm{ev}_{A}}"', from=3-1, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\mathrm{Aff}_{k}(\mathrm{ev}_{A})}"', from=1-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow["{\mu_{A}}", from=1-1, to=1-3]
\end{tikzcd}
